Physics Club   NIT Surat
We are the
Physics Club of NIT Surat
We are a community to celebrate the grandiose of the universe,
aiming at cultivating the love for physics and kindling the interest via science communication, conducting culturo-intellectual events like talks, workshops, quizzes, seminars and many more...
